alert.note: Alert for Delaware; Sullivan (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 13 at 6:56PM EDT until July 13 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM EDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL DELAWARE AND NORTHWESTERN SULLIVAN COUNTIES... At 656 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Roscoe, or 16 miles northwest of Liberty, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Rockland, Fremont, Jeffersonville, White Sulphur Springs, Stalker, Hazel, Livingston Manor, East Branch, Roscoe and Peabrook. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
